name: Retro Recoil
description:
Your ship has run out of fuel, and you need to avoid the asteroids and aliens coming to get you, with only a laser gun at your side you need to use the recoil to both shoot and manuever around enemies!

Retro Recoil is an arcade styled shooter, inspired by last man sitting, where you use the mouse cursor, and the recoil from firing a weapon to move and avoid enemies.

MUSIC CREDITS:

Cunning Plan

https://opengameart.org/content/cunning-plan-short-seamless-loop
